description.en: Here you will find the vocabulary from Unit 5-Preview in the Summit 1A coursebook, such as "rural area", "suburb", "location", etc.
description.id: Di sini Anda akan menemukan kosa kata dari Unit 5-Pratinjau di buku kursus KTT 1A, seperti "Area Pedesaan", "Suburb", "Lokasi", dll.

en.long: a class or group of people or things that have common characteristics or share particular qualities

id.long: kelas atau kelompok orang atau hal-hal yang memiliki karakteristik umum atau berbagi kualitas tertentu

en.long: the geographic position of someone or something
a residential region like cities, towns, and suburbs that is characterized by high population density

id.long: Wilayah perumahan seperti kota, kota, dan pinggiran kota yang ditandai dengan kepadatan populasi yang tinggi

en.long: an area of land located outside the densely populated urban areas in a city or town

id.long: Area tanah yang terletak di luar daerah perkotaan yang padat di kota atau kota

en.long: a residential area outside a city
